# Room Rental System with AI Integration

This project is a Node.js MVC application for managing room/house rentals with AI features.

## Project Structure
- Models: Database schemas (User, Property, Booking, Review)
- Views: HTML templates and frontend assets
- Controllers: Business logic handlers
- Routes: API endpoints
- Middleware: Authentication, validation, error handling
- AI Services: Property recommendations, image recognition, chatbot
